properties.entry:
The "generate" command generates one or more MAC addresses adhering to the given constraints. The command's default option values are such that executing the command without any options will generate a random unicast address.
See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MAC_address See: https://regauth.standards.ieee.org/standards-ra-web/pub/view.html#registries
The "describe" command reads one or more MAC addresses from the standard input and prints information about them such as whether they are unicast addresses, locally administered, etc.
